title: Template:R from incomplete name
source:
<noinclude>{{This is a redirect/rcat}}
</noinclude>{{Redirect template
  |id=R from incomplete name
  |name=From an incomplete name
  |from=a title that is an ''incomplete'' form of a topic's correct name
  |info=The correct name is {{#if:{{{1|}}}|{{Big|{{maroon|{{{1}}}}}}}|given by the target of this redirect}}.
** Use this rcat to tag redirects from an ''incomplete'' form of a name, including a person's, a geographic entity's full name, or a book title. For acceptable ''short names'', please use {{tl|R from short name}} instead. For outright ''erroneous'' names, please use {{tl|R from incorrect name}} instead.
** This redirect is kept to aid [[H:S|searches]]. Pages linking to this title should be updated to link directly to the correct title given above, unless the form is an acceptable ''short name'' better tagged by {{tl|R from short name}}.
** This template tags redirects with a subcategory of the {{c|Redirects from incorrect names}} category, so the template {{tl|R from incorrect name}} should not be used with this one.
  |printworthy=no
  |all category=Redirects from incomplete names
}}<noinclude>
<!-- Place categories on /doc subpage; interwikis go to Wikidata. -->
{{Documentation}}
</noinclude>
